item.title: 黑石支持的广告技术公司Liftoff撤回IPO申请
item.description: Liftoff Mobile公司撤回了首次公开募股申请，此前不到两周，这家移动广告平台运营商曾宣布推迟筹集高达7.62亿美元资金的计划。【原文：Liftoff Mobile Inc. withdrew its IPO filing, less than two weeks after the mobile advertising platform operator said it was postponing plans to raise as much as $762 million.】

item.title: 法国对与俄罗斯有关联的油轮处以罚款，打击"影子船队"
item.description: 法国将释放一艘油轮，此前该船因违反欧盟对俄罗斯石油的制裁而被处以数百万欧元罚款。该油轮上月在地中海被扣押。【原文：France will release a tanker after hitting it with a multimillion-euro fine for flouting European sanctions on Russian oil, following its seizure in the Mediterranean Sea last month.】

item.title: 企业加紧货币对冲操作，因特朗普关税引发损失
item.description: 关税和美元贬值正促使企业加大货币对冲力度，此前这些公司在第四季度已承受数百万美元损失。MillTech调查显示，这表明贸易战正在挤压利润并重塑企业风险策略。【原文：Tariffs and a sliding US dollar are driving companies to ramp up currency hedging after absorbing multi-million-dollar hits in the fourth quarter, a sign that trade wars are squeezing profits and reshaping corporate risk strategy, according to a MillTech survey.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心指数因购房负担能力问题跌至五个月低点
item.description: 本月美国住宅建筑商信心指数再度下滑，持续存在的购房负担能力和高昂建筑成本问题令其陷入困境。【原文：US homebuilders’ confidence slipped again this month, bogged down by persistent worries over affordability and high construction costs.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师认为人工智能颠覆将推动小型银行合并
item.description: 摩根大通分析师指出，美国小型银行在人工智能支出方面难以跟上步伐，可能被迫进行合并以抵消对收入的影响。【原文：Smaller US banks struggling to keep up with artificial-intelligence spending may be pushed into mergers to offset the impact on their revenues, according to analysts at JPMorgan & Chase & Co.】

item.title: 汉莎航空在海湾国家压力下扩大与印度航空的合作
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司扩大了与印度航空有限公司的合作关系，这家德国航空公司在全球最大的航空市场之一面临激烈竞争之际，正努力拓展其业务版图。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG expanded its partnership with Air India Ltd. as the German carrier pushes to extend its footprint amid heavy competition in one of the world’s biggest aviation markets.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌，人工智能担忧持续影响市场情绪
item.description: 美国股市在假期缩短的本周初段走低，因市场持续担忧人工智能技术可能颠覆众多行业。【原文：US equities slid at the start of the holiday-shortened week as worries that artificial-intelligence technology may upend a large swathe of industries continued to ripple through the market.】

item.title: 激进投资者Jana Partners入股Fiserv
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Jana Partners是支付处理商Fiserv Inc.的股东，正推动该公司进行变革。【原文：Jana Partners is a shareholder in payments processor Fiserv Inc. and is pushing for changes at the company, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比称若通胀回落或将多次降息
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比周一表示，如果通胀率继续向央行2%的目标回落，今年可能进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said Monday there is potential for more interest rate cuts this year, if inflation continues to return towards the central bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 尼日利亚股市在上涨后突破贬值前市值
item.description: 尼日利亚股市今年开局强劲，已收复两年前奈拉大幅贬值所导致的市值损失。【原文：Nigerian stocks’ strong start to the year has helped them recover the market value wiped out by a sharp naira devaluation two years ago.】

item.title: 软银支持的Emergent公司一年内实现1亿美元年化营收
item.description: 总部位于印度和美国的人工智能初创公司Emergent表示，其人工智能驱动的软件开发平台在推出不到一年的时间里，已实现1亿美元的年收入运行率。【原文：India- and US-based AI startup Emergent said it has reached a $100 million annual revenue run rate less than a year after launching its artificial intelligence-powered software development platform.】

item.title: AMC启动贷款出售计划，作为25亿美元再融资计划的一部分
item.description: AMC娱乐控股公司正寻求从信贷投资者处筹集近25亿美元资金，用于重组现有债务。【原文：AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. is seeking nearly $2.5 billion from credit investors to refinance existing debt.】

item.title: 双子星公司IPO数月后与三位高管分道扬镳
item.description: 双子星空间站公司周二宣布，其首席运营官、首席财务官和首席法律官将离职，而该公司上市仅数月之久。【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc. said it is parting ways with its chief operating officer, chief financial officer and chief legal officer on Tuesday, just months after going public.】

item.title: 塞内加尔获得资金以支付三月到期的欧元债券款项
item.description: 据知情人士透露，塞内加尔已筹措到足够资金支付3月到期的欧元债券，这缓解了投资者对该国政府偿还美元债务能力的担忧。【原文：Senegal secured sufficient funding to meet eurobond payments due in March, according to people familiar with the matter, easing investor anxiety about the government’s ability to service its dollar-denominated debt.】

item.title: 英国青年就业危机加剧，政府政策适得其反
item.description: 英国青年失业率首次超过欧盟平均水平，工党政府因提高最低工资标准并计划加强就业法规而被指责加剧了失业问题。【原文：Youth unemployment in Britain has soared above the European Union average for the first time, with the Labour government accused of making the situation worse by hiking the minimum wage and planning to bolster employment laws.】

item.title: 加拿大通胀率小幅回落至2.3%，汽油价格下跌
item.description: 加拿大上月整体通胀率放缓至2.3%，低于经济学家预期的2.4%，因汽油价格同比下跌。【原文：Canada’s headline inflation rate slowed to 2.3% last month, cooler than economist expectations for 2.4%, as gasoline prices fell on a yearly basis.】

item.title: 纽约工厂活动连续第二个月扩张，前景持续改善
item.description: 纽约州工厂活动在2月份实现连续第二个月扩张，制造商对未来业务前景的信心进一步增强。【原文：New York state factory activity expanded in February for a second month and manufacturers grew more upbeat about future business.】

item.title: 意大利将以观察员身份加入特朗普和平委员会，部长表示
item.description: 意大利将以观察员身份出席周四在华盛顿举行的特朗普总统加沙和平委员会会议，此前因法律顾虑而放弃了全面参与。【原文：Italy will be an observer on President Donald Trump’s Gaza peace board in Washington Thursday, after ruling out full participation due to legal concerns.】

item.title: 黑石集团即将以25亿美元收购冠军集团
item.description: 据知情人士透露，黑石集团正就以约25亿美元收购住宅服务提供商冠军集团进行深入谈判。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire residential services provider Champions Group for about $2.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大消费者信心创关税后新高 青年群体引领复苏
item.description: 加拿大消费者信心指数攀升至2024年末美国总统特朗普首次威胁对该国商品征收25%关税以来的最高水平。尽管房地产市场和劳动力数据释放出矛盾信号，但年轻群体正推动乐观情绪激增。【原文：Canadian consumer confidence climbed to its highest level since US President Donald Trump first threatened 25% tariffs on the country’s goods in late 2024, with young adults driving a burst of optimism even as the housing market and labor data flash mixed signals.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：丹纳赫、费瑟夫、通用磨坊、马西莫、Zim
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:45，标普500指数期货下跌0.4%。在缩短交易周伊始，投资者正聚焦于发掘人工智能板块中具有投资价值的个股。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures fall 0.4% as of 7:45 a.m. in New York. The search for stocks on the right side of the artificial intelligence trade is front and center for investors at the start of a shortened week.】

item.title: 古巴燃油短缺将迫使谢里特公司暂停镍钴业务
item.description: 雪瑞特国际公司计划暂停在古巴的镍和钴生产，因燃料供应限制影响了这个陷入困境的共产主义岛国。该公司股价下跌。【原文：Sherritt International Corp. plans to suspend nickel and cobalt production in Cuba as fuel supply constraints affect the struggling communist-run island. The company’s shares fell.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利分析师将花旗集团列为首选银行股
item.description: 摩根士丹利分析师表示，由于花旗集团盈利能力持续改善，其股价仍有上涨空间。此前该股本月触及17年高点。【原文：Citigroup Inc. shares have room to run due to improving profitability at the bank, Morgan Stanley analysts said after the stock hit a 17-year high this month.】

item.title: 普京对Telegram的打压遭俄国宣传人员抨击
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京的部分最狂热支持者正因克里姆林宫最新举措而群情激愤——该举措旨在限制Telegram通讯服务，并推动民众使用国家支持的新替代应用。【原文：Some of Russian President Vladimir Putin’s most vocal fans are up in arms over the Kremlin’s latest move to restrict the Telegram messaging service and push people to use a new state-backed alternative.】

item.title: SpaceX校友为数据中心光技术筹集5000万美元
item.description: 网状光技术公司（Mesh Optical Technologies）是一家致力于开发数据中心高速数据传输硬件的初创企业，该公司近日完成由乔舒亚·库什纳（Joshua Kushner）旗下Thrive Capital领投的5000万美元融资，将用于在美国扩大该技术的生产规模。【原文：Mesh Optical Technologies, a startup working on hardware used to move data at high speeds within data centers, raised a $50 million funding round led by Joshua Kushner’s Thrive Capital to scale manufacturing of the technology in the US.】

item.title: 美国正加强其核能供应链建设
item.description: 如果新反应堆最终建成，它们将需要大量燃料。【原文：New reactors will need a lot more fuel if they eventually get built.】

item.title: 安德森·霍洛维茨基金领投3亿美元融资，支持独角兽企业Kavak
item.description: 据这家初创企业首席执行官透露，墨西哥在线二手车经销商Kavak在由安德森·霍洛维茨基金领投的股权融资中筹集了3亿美元。【原文：Mexico-based online used car dealer Kavak raised $300 million in an equity round led by Andreessen Horowitz, according to the startup’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 安赛乐南非资产获钢铁加工企业接洽
item.description: 南非钢铁加工企业已向该国最大的开发金融机构提出一项提案，寻求协助接管安赛乐米塔尔南非公司经营困难的当地子公司。【原文：South African steel processors have approached the country’s biggest development-finance institution with a proposal to help take control of ArcelorMittal SA’s struggling local unit.】

item.title: 双子星已准备好让谷歌搜索退休
item.description: Alphabet的人工智能已发展到足以接管的程度。【原文：Alphabet’s AI has matured to the point where it can take over】

item.description:
OpenAI、Stripe、SpaceX和Skims的投资方表示，其采取的是"生死与共"的投资策略。

【原文：

The backer of OpenAI, Stripe, SpaceX and Skims says it’s taking “ride-or-die” approach to investing.
